name: ListDraftBills
description:
Retrieve a list of draft bills.

This tool is used to get a list of draft bills from the Ramp service, including pagination information. Call this when you need to access or manage draft billing entries.

parameters.name: filter_by_entity_id
parameters.description: Filter draft bills by a specific entity ID.

value_schema.description: Filter draft bills by entity.

parameters.name: filter_by_vendor_id
parameters.description: Filter draft bills by vendor using a vendor ID as a string.

value_schema.description: Filter draft bills by vendor.

parameters.name: filter_from_creation_date
parameters.description: Filter draft bills with a creation date on or after this ISO 8601 datetime string.

value_schema.description: Shows only draft bills with a created_at on or after this date. This parameter should be provided as a datetime string that conforms to ISO 8601

parameters.name: before_creation_date
parameters.description: Filters draft bills created on or before this date. Provide as an ISO 8601 datetime string.

value_schema.description: Shows only draft bills with a created_at on or before this date. This parameter should be provided as a datetime string that conforms to ISO 8601

parameters.name: due_date_from
parameters.description: Shows draft bills due on or after this date. Use ISO 8601 datetime format.

value_schema.description: Shows only draft bills with a due_at on or after this date. This parameter should be provided as a datetime string that conforms to ISO 8601

parameters.name: due_date_before
parameters.description: Filter draft bills by a due date on or before this date. Must be an ISO 8601 datetime string.

value_schema.description: Shows only draft bills with a due_at on or before this date. This parameter should be provided as a datetime string that conforms to ISO 8601

parameters.name: issued_date_start_filter
parameters.description: Filter draft bills issued on or after this date (ISO 8601 format).

value_schema.description: Shows only draft bills with a issued_at on or after this date. This parameter should be provided as a datetime string that conforms to ISO 8601

parameters.name: filter_to_issued_date
parameters.description: Filter draft bills to those issued on or before this date. Use ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Shows only draft bills with a issued_at on or before this date. This parameter should be provided as a datetime string that conforms to ISO 8601

parameters.name: pagination_start_id
parameters.description: The ID of the last entity from the previous page for pagination purposes.

value_schema.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Number of draft bills to return per page, between 2 and 100. Default is 20.

value_schema.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

parameters.description: Shows only draft bills with a due_at on or before this date. This parameter should be provided as a datetime string that conforms to ISO 8601

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

value_schema.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

value_schema.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
